question:
Some people think that they should spend money they earn now enjoying life, while others think that the money should be put into savings for future.
Discuss both views and give your opinion.
text: Nowadays civilians are becoming more and more money minded across the world compared to  past few decades. Money is an essential part of living an enjoyable life and from which we all are aware of. So some people contented that money should be spent by people as they earn them to live luxurious lives, contrasty others argue that money should be preserved for future.

Firstly, expenditure of wealth right away after earning it, can have enormously enjoyable careers in terms of many aspects such as living in a luxurious house, commuting in branded cars and so forth. That is the basic definition of spending an excellent life on the earth which can come forward in one's mind conveniently. Moreover, purchasing expensive households and organizing an incredible event like parties, can bring happiness of the world. Consequently, person can have not only luxurious careers at home but also on outdoors as well, for example, taking world tours and so on, in which citizens can explore a true meaning of having a wonderful life. A good example for this is that, according to one survey, 9 out of 10 citizens are spending their wealth as long as they earn in a quest of living an exclusive present.

Nevertheless, as per some group's point of view citizens  need to be prepared for their lives's  consequences as well, which can be done by saving their pay for some unusual circumstances such as sudden health problems like major accidents or illness. In this scenario, they can use preserved currency without asking someone's help in financial matters. Additionally, it can also help some relatives or friends if they are in any kind of financial crisis. In addition, it  can be a good habit  as it can help not only to secure the future of their loved ones, but also guide their children to follow the same path when they become self-directed. For instance, 60% of the population are having a wonderful future due to this habit of preserving cash compared to others who spend their earnings in seconds.

In a conclusion, as per my opinion citizens should save their earnings for a bright present because it can help them in various ways which are discussed above in ordered to live a healthy and wealthy fortune later on.
